txt.en: In the centre of the field stands an evil-looking relic, clearly not of hobbit-make. You stare warily at the relic, but it divulges none of its secrets. You feel vaguely ill; an unhealthy aura seems to emanate from the relic.

'Do you know what this horrible thing is? If you know anything about it, you need to tell me at once! I will not stand for this sort of thing, I tell you! We are honest, respectable folk and do not deserve to have such awful things placed in our backyards without our knowledge or consent! I mean, honestly! Have you ever seen such a thing?'
'When I find out who did this, I will have some words for them!'
A mysterious relic has appeared in the middle of Bungo Grubb's pipe-weed, killing the entire crop.
Bungo Grubb cannot believe the frightening relic that appeared in his pipe-weed field in Oatbarton.
